overview: Razi (Javed Sheikh) and Maima (Atiqa Odho) split up after he marries a second wife Phool. Maima goes to Hong Kong where she has a son, Zain (Shaan) who proceeds to fall in love with Chand (Noor), who happens to be Razi's daughter with his second wife. Along the way Babu Baral, Zameen (Reema) and Imran (Moammar Rana) get involved in this lighthearted comedy.
title: Mujhe Chand Chahiye
